name: Cauliflower Steaks with Mushroom Gravy. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: Cauliflower Steaks with Mushroom Gravy. Easy Roasted Cauliflower Slices served with mushroom thyme gravy. Vegan gluten-free Festive Main for the holidays.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coconut milk or other non dairy milk
Black pepper or cayenne to taste
1 teaspoon  nutritional yeast (or use 1/4 to 1/2 tsp ground mustard to make yeast-free)
1 Tablespoon cornstarch dissolved in 2 Tablespoon water (or use other thickeners like arrowroot/potato starch or plain flour)

itemListElement.text: Heat oil over medium-low heat in a skillet. Add onions. mushrooms and garlic and cook partially covered for 15+ minutes or until evenly brown.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil over medium-low heat in a skillet. Add onions. mushrooms and garlic and cook partially covered for 15+ minutes or until evenly brown.

itemListElement.text: Stir once or twice in between.
itemListElement.name: Stir once or twice in between.

itemListElement.text: Add the herbs and mix well. I used dried herbs for the pictures, use fresh or dried to preference.
itemListElement.name: Add the herbs and mix well. I used dried herbs for the pictures, use fresh or dried to preference.

itemListElement.text: Add water and coconut milk, salt, pepper, cover and bring to a boil. 3-4 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add water and coconut milk, salt, pepper, cover and bring to a boil. 3-4 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Taste and adjust salt, herbs, spice.
itemListElement.name: Taste and adjust salt, herbs, spice.

itemListElement.text: Add cornstarch mixture and nutritional yeast and continue to mix until it thickens. 1 minute.
itemListElement.name: Add cornstarch mixture and nutritional yeast and continue to mix until it thickens. 1 minute.

itemListElement.text: Switch off the heat and keep aside
itemListElement.name: Switch off the heat and keep aside

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile, Brush the cauliflower on both sides with olive oil or other oil.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile, Brush the cauliflower on both sides with olive oil or other oil.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper and dried herbs of choice.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper and dried herbs of choice.

itemListElement.text: Place on parchment lined baking sheet and bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25-30 minutes or until tender in the center.
itemListElement.name: Place on parchment lined baking sheet and bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25-30 minutes or until tender in the center.

itemListElement.text: Broil on Low for a minute for a more charred cauliflower.
itemListElement.name: Broil on Low for a minute for a more charred cauliflower.

itemListElement.text: Serve hot with the gravy and a side salad.
itemListElement.name: Serve hot with the gravy and a side salad.

itemListElement.text: Top with fresh parsley/thyme and black pepper.
itemListElement.name: Top with fresh parsley/thyme and black pepper.
